I first played on PS4 and now play on Switch with my husband and friends. While I get my computer up I hope to eventually transfer my progress to PC/across whatever when their Behaviour account system is properly setup. Fun to play with friends when you can get a call going - I actually started playing as a killer on PS4 alone though. So. Fun both ways. Good selection of survivors and killers now and they plan to add more as they can work out deals. Decent company I would support.
fun game, gets intense when doing the generators but overall good game to play

The game is unbalanced at its core, and its unfixable.
1. In high ranking marches the winner depends on how many mistakes the survivors made, not how well the Killer played. If both played perfectly the survivors will win
2. The ranking system is terrible. I have been dancing between rank 1-3. Most of the time either you will face survivors that pretty much kill themselves or ones that will dance on your face with flashlights and theres nothing you can do about it. Either im in the wrong rank or they are.
3. SWF (surviving with friends) The extra advantage that playing with friends gives a group of high rank survivors is ridiculous. This is the only point that can be fixed. It could be easly fixed by buffing the killer for each friend on the survivor team. But it wont be fixed since 2/3 of the comunity is main survivor
4. The worst problem is the comunity. I have never faced a more toxic comunity (and i have played LoL for 10 years). As a killer if you dont play how the survivors want you to, you are a scumbag and the worst kind of human being, and the wont shy away from sharing their thoughts on the aftermatch chat.
This last point is the main issue because any possible fix to the other points will unleash the apocalyptic rage of the comunity

its a fun 4v1 game where your adrenaline runs high while outmatching a killer or downing a survivor. Its a great co-op experince to work together to open a gate or get your friends killed. if your having a rough day killing some survivors also helps relieve stress. With many diffrent perks to fit your playstyle and diffrent killers to mix up your gameplay. plus constant updates keeps this game fresh.

Dead by Daylight is not a game to enjoyed, expect to be camped as soon as you've been hooked by the killer and seeing your friends die as they try to save you, then the team communication goes to sh*t because you all begin to scream whose fault it is to why you're all dead for the mean time the killer enjoys the chaos among all of you! This game should not be taken lightly as it is not for your enjoyment but to make you mentally suffer. 7.9/10

비추를 하지만 이 게임이 나쁜 게임이란 것은 아니다.
비대칭 PVP게임에선 독보적 지위를 갖고 롱런하는 게임으로 확실한 게임성을 갖고 있다.
하지만 매우 고였다는 점과 매치업 시스템에 문제가 있다는 점이 조화를 이뤄 신규 유저의 진입은 고생스러운데.
특히 1인이 한진영을 다해야하는 살인마의 경우 술래잡기만 몇년씩한 썩은물들의 노리개가 되는 일이 빈번하다.
그리고 VPN을 써서 일본섭으로 가서 게임을 하라는 것이 꼼수가 아니라 공공연한 팁이 되어있는 현실을 보면
이 게임을 하는 한국 유저들에게 문제가 있는게 하는 생각도 든다.

1줄요약
이 게임이 나쁜 게임은 아니지만 새로 진입하는 것은 추천하지 않는다.

Comprei há 2 anos e fui jogar só agora. que arrependimento. Ele não tem tantas pessoas ainda, mas continua sendo um jogo que causa muito susto e extremamente estratégico. Jogar de killer não é fácil como parece e ser sobrevivente tem que pegar as manhãs. Recomendo muito, só acho ruim ele ser pago, deveria ser free e cobrar apenas o passe de temporada, teria mais jogadores. a sim funciona cross play bem legal.

tl;dr: It's a good game but expect a lot of DLCs if you want to play with all characters and their respective perks. Also expect some complicated systems that just slows the player progress for no reason. (those are the reasons for thumbs down).

This game is good, I recommend it.
The down sides are the amount of DLCs, any non-standard Survivor/Killer is paid either with real money or in-game currency (Iridescent Shards you get by leveling and Auric Cells you buy via micro-transaction in the in-game store).

Any "licensed"(a.k.a copyrighted) content(leather-face, strange things, etc) is only acquired via DLCs through steam or Auric Cells, while all the others can also be purchased with Iridescent Shards received for free when leveling.

Even though you receive free Iridescent Shards, it is not a lot and comes super slow, for example, right now I have 50hrs of game play and I managed to get around 13k Iridescent Shards and each Survivor or Killer costs 9k. You can also buy Teachable perks from character you don't own that cost 2k, sometimes more.

The game also requires A LOT of grinding for "blood points" which allows you to unlock new perks and add-ons. In order to get perks from a different character you need to level that character until you unlock Teachable perks(level 30-40).
So basically if you want to have a specific build with specific perks you will need to level almost every character even the ones you will never gonna play or buy Teachable perks with Iridescent Shards which rotates every week and the best perks or perks belonging to licensed content are almost never available for purchase (sometimes once or twice a year).

The feel you have once you realize how the progress system works and how you unlock things is that Behaviour is trying to milk as much money as possible with DLCs and extremely long non-sense grind.
some of the killers are a bit OP, but so are a few survivors. it has a bit of a learning curve, but once you get the hang of it, your friends meaty corpses are yours for the taking >:)
A cada hora que passa jogando esse game, mais eu fico puto e mais eu dou risada, recomendo demais!

Кароче, игруха прикольная, но одному не так интерестно

1. 長期不解決倖存者SWF(多排)過強問題(修機速度過快、等同擁有所有氣場技能等)

2. 長期單方面削弱殺手, 無視倖存者主流技能、道具過強問題

3. 承上, 導致殺手出現報復式、消極等遊戲行為(如不斷守屍、針對、斬殺、掛機等), 單排倖存者很大程度身受其害

3.5. 倖存者的升段評分準則過度寬鬆, 導致部分倖存者(尤其是依賴SWF升段的)一旦單排遊玩, 便會顯得其實力和觀念與段位不成正比, 很大程度會拖累其他實力觀念很紮實的單排倖存者

4. 導致這遊戲只有SWF才能享受正常遊戲體驗, 單排倖存者與殺手會玩得很痛苦

5. 遊戲4年間不間斷存在多bug問題

6. 長期的壓榨殺手方、偏重倖存者方的改版迫使許多殺手玩家轉型倖存者方, 甚至直接退坑, 令殺手玩家嚴重不足, 導致出現倖存者排隊時間過長、新手殺手會配對到老手倖存者的不平等狀況

總結 : 有意入坑殺手或單排倖存者的請三思, 有可能會令你感到遊戲體驗很差

————————————————————

給已入坑、正在玩得痛苦的殺手或單排倖存者玩家們：這世界有很多比這擁有更有趣內容、更公平環境、更潔淨玩家社群的遊戲, 不用太留戀這遊戲, 隨時可以跟這垃圾道別。以前在這遊戲上的課金就當作交學費就好, 反正以後不要再給這製作團隊面子就好, 出去感受更好的遊戲體驗。共勉之٩(｡・ω・｡)و

————————————————————

9/1/2021更新：

新一份大型更新報告果然再度證明論點2, 殺手方的強勢技能馬上就會受到打壓削弱, 相反倖存者方的強勢技能卻仍然健在, 然後多排和修機速度過快的問題依然繼續無視。每一次大削弱的都只會是殺手方, 而且是一次削弱到底的那種, 並不會像倖存者般象徵式削弱, 然後nerf東buff西般在其他方面給倖存者甜頭。

總而言之, 殺手玩家真的無謂再跟這垃圾遊戲糾纏了, 以前我還會安慰說可以繼續玩不過別再課金就好, 現在我真的覺得直接勸退你就好, 無謂傷神又得不到好的遊戲體驗。然後給單排倖存者玩家, 我只能說祝你好運, 既要應付隊友失常和殺手報復式打法的問題, 又要應付排隊時間有可能會更長的問題。最後, 如果你是未入坑又想玩殺手的人：回頭吧, 別進入這個無間地獄。
Very good for party gameplay, not so good for solo queue.
